com.betfair.cougar.util

Class NetworkAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betfair.cougar.util.NetworkAddress

  • public class NetworkAddress
extends Object
    Represents an IP network (as opposed to an IP Address) and is able to identify if an IP address is a member of the network

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAddressInNetwork(String address) 
      static boolean isValidIPAddress(String networkAddress)
      Verify if a given string is a valid dotted quad notation IP Address
      static NetworkAddress parse(String networkAddress)
      parse a network address identifier, consisting of an ip4Address/netMask, where both ip4Address and netMask are presented in dotted quad notation.
      static NetworkAddress parseBlock(String networkAddress)
      parse a CIDR network block identifier, consisting of an ip4Address/prefixSize, where both ip4Address and netMask are presented in dotted quad notation.
      String toString()

      • isAddressInNetwork

        public boolean isAddressInNetwork(String address)
        Parameters:
        address -
        Returns:
        true if address is a member of this network

      • parse

        public static NetworkAddress parse(String networkAddress)
        parse a network address identifier, consisting of an ip4Address/netMask, where both ip4Address and netMask are presented in dotted quad notation. e.g. 92.6.4.0/255.255.255.0
        Returns:

      • parseBlock

        public static NetworkAddress parseBlock(String networkAddress)
        parse a CIDR network block identifier, consisting of an ip4Address/prefixSize, where both ip4Address and netMask are presented in dotted quad notation. e.g. 192.0.2.0/24
        Returns:
        See Also:
        {http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classless_Inter-Domain_Routing#IPv4_CIDR_blocks}

      • isValidIPAddress

        public static boolean isValidIPAddress(String networkAddress)
        Verify if a given string is a valid dotted quad notation IP Address
        Parameters:
        networkAddress - The address string
        Returns:
        true if its valid, false otherwise
